By peering into a [[wikipedia:crystal ball|crystal ball]], the user can see the current activities of anyone whose [[chakra]] signature they know. Users can view subjects from any location, regardless of distance or potential obstructions, making it ideal for intelligence gathering. The [[Third Hokage]] uses this technique to monitor the villagers of [[Konohagakure]] and thus maintain public order.<ref name="d1"/>

== Trivia ==
* In "[[Road to Naruto the Movie]]" (and its [[Prologue of Road to Ninja|anime adaptation]]), [[Tobi]] used this technique to gather information for his [[Limited Tsukuyomi]]. He then used the crystal ball itself as a medium to cast and host the [[Genjutsu World]] he created with that information.
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Kizuna Drive]]'', Gensui used this technique to control his [[Tailed Beast Replication|false tailed beasts]] and to shoot spheres of energy.
